content.prompt: A customer is looking for a restaurant that has at least 1 review and mexican cuisine, with spicy food.  I should have at least tables with 2 seating and has a number of maximum allowed reservation exactly at 30. Write a python code when you're assumed to be given a dataset of restaurants in json assigned to a variable
